'''Super OS''' (formerly: Super Ubuntu<ref name="hacktolive.org">[http://hacktolive.org/blog/2009/super-os-9-04-the-new-super-ubuntu-is-now-out/ hacktolive.org/blog/2009/super-os-9-04-the-new-super-ubuntu-is-now-out/]</ref>) is a [[gratis|freely-available]] [[Linux distribution]]. It is a [[Software remastering|remastered]] version of [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] made with [[Reconstructor]].<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_OS Super OS (Super Ubuntu)]</ref> Its main goal is to provide an âOut of the Boxâ experience,<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_Ubuntu_FAQ Super OS FAQ]</ref> and being very usable offline<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_OS "Focus on making it very usable offline" - main Super OS page]</ref>, containing various enhancements over [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]]. It has the goal of remaining compatible with Ubuntu<ref>http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_OS</ref>.

'''Super OS''' (formerly: Super Ubuntu<ref name="hacktolive.org">[http://hacktolive.org/blog/2009/super-os-9-04-the-new-super-ubuntu-is-now-out/ hacktolive.org/blog/2009/super-os-9-04-the-new-super-ubuntu-is-now-out/]</ref>) is a [[gratis|freely-available]] [[Linux distribution]]. It is a [[Software remastering|remastered]] version of [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] made with [[Reconstructor]].<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_OS Super OS (Super Ubuntu)]</ref> Its main goal is to provide an âOut of the Boxâ experience,<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_Ubuntu_FAQ Super OS FAQ]</ref> and being usable offline<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_OS "Focus on making it very usable offline" - main Super OS page]</ref>, containing various enhancements over [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]]. It has the goal of remaining compatible with Ubuntu<ref>http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_OS</ref>.
